description.schinese: 在难度15情况下打败最终boss

description.english: Level 15 for Warcluck, Sealioneer, Mouscle, Snipeagle and AlphaGou
Unlock all the talents of Warcluck
description.schinese: 解锁战斗鸡的全部天赋

description.english: Unlock all the talents of Sealineer
description.schinese: 解锁工程狮的全部天赋

description.english: Unlock all the talents of Mouscle
description.schinese: 解锁肌肉鼠的全部天赋

description.english: Unlock all the talents of Snipeagle
description.schinese: 解锁瞄头鹰的全部天赋

description.english: Unlock all the talents of AlphaGou
description.schinese: 解锁阿法狗的全部天赋

description.english: Receive the highest level of supply
Mobile base passes without taking damage
description.schinese: 基地车从未受到伤害情况下通关

description.english: Have more than 3000 gold when beat the game

description.schinese: 在50分钟内通关一局游戏
鸡械单次伤害打出超过5000
瞄头鹰单次伤害打出超过60000
背包内拥有超过30个鸡械

description.english: A glass of juice caused a tragedy, to the stomach upset Sealineer handing paper
description.schinese: 一杯果汁引发的惨案,给闹肚子的工程狮递纸

description.english: A glass of juice caused a tragedy, sell a cup of Poopy Orange Juice to the Sealineer
description.schinese: 一杯果汁引发的惨案,把一杯粑粑橘汁卖给工程狮

description.english: Carrying two types of trained Cluckmech beat the game
description.schinese: 携带两种训练后的鸡械通关

description.english: Get a fancy little piece of junk as a souvenir
description.schinese: 获得时尚小垃圾作为纪念品

description.english: Discover a paradise in a volcanic massif
description.schinese: 发现火山地块中的世外桃源

description.english: Carrying Cowboy Cat and Bear Bully beat the game
description.schinese: 携带山贼猫和路霸熊通关

description.english: Carrying 5 Circus Chameleon beat the game
description.schinese: 携带5个马戏团变色龙通关

description.english: Carrying Stonelion Tower and Stonelion Crossbow Turret beat the game
description.schinese: 携带狮氏石狮塔和狮氏石矢塔通关

description.english: Deploy Muscle Dog when 20 power, many animals are impressed by the classic villain in some wacky fairy tale.
description.schinese: 20动力时放置肌肉狗狗,不少动物们对某个古怪童话故事里的经典反派印象深刻
突变模式中获得1次满勋章

description.english: Pass 1 weekly Mutant Mode with Warcluck
description.schinese: 使用战斗鸡通关1次每周突变

description.english: Pass 1 weekly Mutant Mode with Sealioneer
description.schinese: 使用工程狮通关1次每周突变

description.english: Pass 1 weekly Mutant Mode with Mouscle
description.schinese: 使用肌肉鼠通关1次每周突变

description.english: Pass 1 weekly Mutant Mode with Snipeagle
description.schinese: 使用瞄头鹰通关1次每周突变

description.english: Pass 1 weekly Mutant Mode with AlphaGou
description.schinese: 使用阿法狗通关1次每周突变

description.english: Break Giant Mutant Plants in Desert
description.schinese: 击破荒漠的巨大异变植物

description.english: Break Giant Mutant Plants in Beach
description.schinese: 击破海滩的巨大异变植物

description.english: Break Giant Mutant Plants in Swamp
description.schinese: 击破沼泽的巨大异变植物

description.english: Break Giant Mutant Plants in Glaciers
description.schinese: 击破冰川的巨大异变植物

description.english: Stealing Power from Igloos using Night-heron
description.schinese: 使用中华田园企鹅偷取企鹅冰屋的能源

description.english: Carrying 5 Bee series cluckmech beat the game
Carrying Sealioneer Energy Beacon beat the game
description.schinese: 携带工程狮能量信标通关

description.english: Carrying Deep Sea King and Ghost Dolphin beat the game
description.schinese: 携带深海王与幽灵海豚通关

description.english: Reach 1000 Attack with the Fox Turret
description.schinese: 用狐狸塔达到1000点攻击力

description.english: Discover a Mystery Room in Abandoned Lab
description.schinese: 发现废弃研究所中的神秘房间
购买任意1个被控制系列鸡械

description.english: Carrying Sardine Bucket, Tropical Fish Bucket,Barracuda Bucket beat the game
description.schinese: 携带沙丁鱼桶、热带鱼桶、梭鱼老大爷通关

description.english: Carrying Pirate Gang Data beat the game
description.schinese: 携带海盗船战斗数据通关

description.english: Carrying at least 4 Iron Steed beat the game
description.schinese: 携带至少4个铁马坐骑通关

description.english: Discover the mole family in the cave
description.schinese: 发现矿洞中的鼹鼠家族

description.english: Play an Endless Mode on any level
description.schinese: 任意难度进行一次无尽关卡

description.english: Stick to wave 5 on level 15 endless mode
description.schinese: 难度15无尽关卡通关第5波

description.english: Stick to wave 10 on level 15 endless mode
description.schinese: 难度15无尽关卡通关第10波

description.english: Stick to wave 15 on level 16 endless mode
description.schinese: 难度15无尽关卡通关第15波

description.english: Unlock all the talents of Hungrygator
description.schinese: 解锁肚子鳄的全部天赋

description.english: Use Hungrygator eat a Cluck Tech Turret
description.schinese: 使用肚子鳄吃掉一个弗朗鸡炮台

description.english: No props were purchased in miner's store
description.schinese: 在矿工商店没有购买任何道具

description.english: Rescue Sealioneer trapped inside the crystal
description.schinese: 拯救困在水晶里面的工程狮

description.english: Use Coin Cluckdozer to win the Jackpot
description.schinese: 使用推币鸡获得终极大奖

description.english: Eat more than 10 traps at once with the Shark Crusher
description.schinese: 使用巨鲨碾碎机一次性吃掉超过10个陷阱

description.english: Use a Weasel to eat a chicken
Carrying Polar Bear, Reindeer, Penguins beat the game
description.schinese: 携带北极熊、驯鹿、企鹅通关

description.english: Carrying at least 2 Teleport Antlion beat the game
description.schinese: 携带至少2个异次元蚁狮通关

description.english: Carrying 5 Mirage series cluckmech beat the game
